name: Superman
description: Increases the attributes of an ally to super human levels.

name: Gruesome Aspect
description: You are cloaked in a digusting and hideous illusion. Enemies that you hit in combat will be deeply disturbed.

name: Elemental
description: Summons an elemental to fight for you.

name: Theft
description: This spell attempts to magically steal an item from an NPC.

name: Forest Vengeance
description: The very forest comes alive and entangles all your foes.

name: Greater Ammo Stash
description: has a great stash of ammo!

name: Petrify
description: Attempts to turn one foe to stone.

name: Deadly Poison
description: A fearsome curse of withering, death and plague.

name: Cure Disease
description: Cures disease in one of your allies.

name: Mental Blast
description: Flays one opponents mind, causing damage and insanity.

name: Lightning Cloud
description: A cloud of lightning engulfs one group of your foes.

name: Telekinesis
description: You're done with subtlety, and feeling angry and emotional. This spell unleashes your raw power on your hapless foes, battering them into submission.

name: Power Word Mute
description: Silences one foe, causing damage even if resisted.

name: Dragon
description: Summons a dragon to fight for you.

name: Elemental Swarm
description: Summons a swarm of elementals to fight for you.

name: Cure Stone
description: Returns life to an ally who has been petrified.

name: Turncoat
description: Beguiles one foe into fighting on your side.

name: Guardian Angel
description: Blesses a party member with a guardian angel that prevents damage.

name: Song of Strength
description: sings an song of great strength and power!

name: Mass Blur
description: Partly conceals members of your party, improving defence and stealth point regeneration.

name: Courage
description: Removes fear from the party and enchants them to resist psychic attacks

name: Cure All
description: Attempts to remove baneful conditions from the whole party.

name: Bolt Of Fire
description: Evokes a scorching bolt of flame towards one of your foes.

name: Stamina
description: Reduces the fatigue of one of your allies.

name: Acid Splash
description: Projects a globe of corrosive acid at a single target.

name: Confidence Trick
description: Magically defrauds one unfortunate NPC in every way possible.

name: Eagle Eye
description: sees with the eyes of the eagle!

name: Call Wyrm
description: Summons a mighty wyrm to fight for you.

name: Wave Of Heat
description: Enchants this tile to provide extra red magic.

name: Twinkling Cape
description: Cloaks you in a twinkling fearie cape that provides all manner of defensive benefits.

name: Blur
description: Partly conceals one of your allies, improving defence and stealth point regeneration.

name: Dazzling Lights
description: An impressive multicoloured spray of brilliant bolts of light streams out over your foes. All kinds of effects are possible.

name: Cerebral Hemorrhage
description: Causes the brain of one of your foes to explode.

name: Melt Armour
description: Softens up the armour of your foes.

name: Ball Of Fire
description: Consumes a group of your foes in a giant ball of fire.

name: Remedy
description: Heals and removes minor conditions from the whole party.

name: Holy Ground
description: Enchants this tile to provide extra white magic.

name: Daylight
description: Bathes the area around one group of foes in the bright wholesome light of day, scorching undead and hindering the stealth of any type of foe.

name: Inspiring Blow
description: inspires allies to feats of glory!

name: Bolt Of Lightning
description: Unleashes a devastating lightning bolt on your foes.

name: Sane Mind
description: Removes insanity, possession and fear conditions.

name: Wither Plants
description: Withers and damages all plant foes.

name: Remove Curse
description: Attempts to remove the curse from a single item.

name: Fervour
description: Inspires belief and ferocity in your party.

name: Call Treant
description: Calls a single treant to fight for you.

name: Healing Factor
description: Enchants a single party member with a boosted hit point regeneration rate.

name: Mage Strength
description: Transforms the sorcerer into a deadly, tireless melee combat machine.

name: Melt Into Mist
description: Replenished party stealth and partly conceals the party for a few rounds.

name: Lava Burst
description: Sprays deadly lava all over a group of your foes.

name: Fearsome Aspect
description: You are cloaked in a fearsome and deadly illusion. Enemies that you hit in combat will be badly affected.

name: Mirror Image
description: Illusory mirror images of the caster spring up, distracting your foes.

name: Song of Rage
description: joyously calls the red mist upon the heroes!

description: The caster will randomly blink in and out of existence.

description: Attempts to identify a single item.

description: Replenishes the stamina of the whole party.

description: Lobs globe of bubbling magma at one of your foes.

description: Summons a phantasm to fight for you.

description: You cast a deadly Left Handed curse at one of your foes.

description: A dazzling flash of light with a chance to blind a group of foes.

description: You are cloaked in might and majesty.

description: sings a ballad of great heroism!

description: Stuns one foe, causing damage even if resisted.

name: Armourplate

description: Heals and removes conditions from one ally.

description: makes a string of bold claims!

description: Veils the party in darkness, instantly replenishing the stealth points of all members.

description: calls upon the wild magic of the fey!

description: Enchants this tile to provide extra black magic.

description: Imbues the recipient with damage reflection.

description: Conjures an invisible wall of force around the party that deflects many incoming projectiles.

description: Summons a demon from the nether levels of hell and bins it to fight for you.

description: The opponents mind is directly attacked.

name: Crush

description: Attempts to wake up all sleeping party members.

description: Used by items and effects to recharge magic points.

description: Coats a group of your foes with corrosive acid.

description: Attempts to adjust the attitude of an NPC to be more favourable towards you.

description: Summons a group of ambulatory plants to fight for the caster.

description: Inflicts a large amount of cold damage to a single foe.

description: Turns one of your allies invisible.

description: The blood of one of your foes boils.

description: Flings a curse of instant death at one of your foes.

description: equips an spear of molten rock

name: Starlight
description: Your party is covered in a starry blanket of Gold Magic, concealing them, enhancing resistances and magic power restoration.

description: Reduces the strength of cloud spell afflicting the party.

name: Resurrection
description: Brings life to one of your dead allies.

name: Sonic Boom
description: Unleashes a thunderous sonic attack on all your foes, leaving them injured, scared,  and even unconscious.

name: Diplomacy
description: Enchants the party so that NPCs that you encounter react more favourably.

name: Faith
description: Fortified the party's saves and resistances.

name: Cloak Of Magic
description: Covers you in a shimmering enchanted cape of pure magic.

name: Mind Flay
description: Flays the minds of every foe.

description: invokes the power of the seas

name: Acid Cloud
description: Coats a group of your foes with corrosive acid.

description: Inflicts a curse of poison on a single foe.

description: Enchants this tile to provide extra purple magic.

description: You speak with the Voice of the faerie folk. Your unfortunate target will be rendered helpless.

description: Batters your foes with an icy exploding ball.

description: Imbues you with the strength of your beliefs.

description: sings an song of outlasting and enduring!

description: calls upon the wild magic of the fey!

description: Attempts to cure one of your allies of poison.

description: Conjures a troupe of shadow warriors to fight for you.
